page.title: 13Ecology and the Environment
page.content: SINCE 1960 Desborough has become twice as big as people have been attracted to the area by the new businesses such as{"Applebys".}As Desborough has grown, more and more cars travel through on the A6 and this has caused a lot more pollution. The{environment has been affected as Desborough has grown. Applebys" started in 1982 and created many jobs for people in Desborough.In 1969,the old cross went from near the monument.Old people,mostly men,used to sit on the seats around the cross and eat nuts.Most of the hotels have gone. The old train station has gone and is now a garage. Most of the land in the survey block is used for farming.The farm on the way to Desborough has 233 acres of land,200 lambing ewes,120 meat cattle, 123 acres,and 35 acres of fruit.
